line.text: Gender?
It's a blazing hot afternoon in Little Rock, Arkansas.
You are a young black male in the 1950s.
You are consumed with thirst and desperately search for some water.
By sheer coincidence you come across this water station.
which fountain do you choose?
It's a blazing hot afternoon in Little Rock, Arkansas.
You are a young black female in the 1950s.
You are consumed with thirst and desperately search for some water.
By sheer coincidence you come across this water station.
which fountain do you choose?
The water is distasteful and smells quite similar to urine but oddly satisfying.
It's getting quite late.
Mom must be furious.
You haven't retrieved eggs from Harp's grocery store.

line.timeText: You are running to the store . . .
line.text: You rush to the store a few blocks from here.
Arriving at the empty counter, you see your favorite candy.
Only having enough money to purchase the eggs you debate on stealing the chocolate.
Do you steal both the eggs and chocolate since there is nobody at the counter and leave?
As you sip the delicious water, you feel a sudden sharp pain buzz through your body.
You have just been smacked upside the head by a white fellow.
Appalled you are unsure how to react.
Fight back or walk away?
You swiftly reach for the merchandise and are successfully able to escape from the store.
The cashier misses you just as you leave.
You are now headed home saving a few bucks.
The sun has set now.
You're anxious because your mother has strictly demanded you be home before dark
Approaching close to home you hear loud distressed screams.
Your elderly neighbor whom you've referred to as Uncle Malik is being beated repeatedly by a group of white hooded individuals.
Alone and frightened you must decide what to do.
Do you intervene or call for help?

line.timeText: You are waiting for the cashier to return . . .
line.text: You decide not to steal and await for the cashier.
As the cashier finally decides to show up 5 minutes later, you must wait your turn.
However; a pack of white people also join and blatantly cut you in line
You are in a rush.
Do you voice your objection or stay quiet
Consumed with rage you lash out and retaliate.
With your small body and hands you are no match for this giant.
You are instantly knocked out and see nothing but darkness.
You awaken with warm water splashed across your face.
Your jaw aches with the slightest movement.
Close to tears you begin to set out to what you initially came to do.
It's getting quite late.
Mom must be furious.
You haven't retrieved eggs from Harp's grocery store.

line.timeText: You are running to the store . . .
line.text: You rush to the store a few blocks from here.
Arriving at the empty counter, you see your favorite candy.
Only having enough money to purchase the eggs you debate on stealing the chocolate.
Do you steal both the eggs and chocolate since there is nobody at the counter and leave?
Being impatient you lash out and retaliate.
You confront the man in front of you and are met with unpleasant comments.
You are shoved back and told to remain quiet.

line.timeText: You are waiting your turn in line . . .
line.text: You continue to wait your turn in line.
The sun has set now.
You're anxious because your mother has strictly demanded you be home before dark
Approaching close to home you hear loud distressed screams.
Your elderly neighbor whom you've referred to as Uncle Malik is being beated repeatedly by a group of white hooded individuals.
Alone and frightened you must decide what to do.
Do you intervene or call for help?
Being patient you keep your mouth shut.

line.timeText: You return to waiting your turn in line . . .
line.text: You continue to wait your turn in line.
The sun has set now.
You're anxious because your mother has strictly demanded you be home before dark
Approaching close to home you hear loud distressed screams.
Your elderly neighbor whom you've referred to as Uncle Malik is being beaten repeatedly by a group of white hooded individuals.
Alone and frightened you must decide what to do.
Do you intervene or call for help?
It's getting quite late.
Mom must be furious.
You haven't retrieved eggs from Harp's grocery store.

line.text: You rush to the store a few blocks from here.
Arriving at the empty counter, you see your favorite candy.
Only having enough money to purchase the eggs you debate on stealing the chocolate.
Do you steal both the eggs and chocolate since there is nobody at the counter and leave?
